title: Fix PGlite WAL accumulation causing unrecoverable crash
description: PGlite never checkpoints, causing WAL files to accumulate indefinitely. MCP tool invocations as separate processes don't cleanly close the database. This led to 930 WAL files (930MB) and WASM memory exhaustion on init. Fix requires: checkpoints, WAL limits, graceful shutdown, transaction safety, and embedding validation.

title: Add embedding dimension validation in Ollama service
Add transaction safety, checkpoints, and WAL limits to Database service
Implement graceful shutdown and WAL health monitoring in CLI
